description: Lists the channel namespaces for a specified Api. ListChannelNamespaces returns only high level details for the channel namespace. To retrieve code handlers, use GetChannelNamespace.

nested_items.name: channelNamespaces
nested_items.description: The ChannelNamespace objects.

nested_items.name: apiId
nested_items.description: The Api ID.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the channel namespace. This name must be unique within the Api.

nested_items.name: subscribeAuthModes
nested_items.description: The authorization mode to use for subscribing to messages on the channel namespace. This configuration overrides the default ``Api``authorization configuration.

nested_items.name: authType
nested_items.description: The authorization type.

nested_items.name: publishAuthModes
nested_items.description: The authorization mode to use for publishing messages on the channel namespace. This configuration overrides the default ``Api``authorization configuration.

nested_items.name: authType
nested_items.description: The authorization type.

nested_items.name: codeHandlers
nested_items.description: The event handler functions that run custom business logic to process published events and subscribe requests.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: channelNamespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the ChannelNamespace.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: The date and time that the ChannelNamespace was created.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time that the ChannelNamespace was last changed.

nested_items.name: handlerConfigs
nested_items.description: The configuration for the OnPublish and OnSubscribe handlers.

nested_items.name: onPublish
nested_items.description: The configuration for the OnPublish handler.

nested_items.name: behavior
nested_items.description: The behavior for the handler.

nested_items.name: integration
nested_items.description: The integration data source configuration for the handler.

nested_items.name: dataSourceName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the data source that has been configured on the API.

nested_items.name: lambdaConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for a Lambda data source.

nested_items.name: invokeType
nested_items.description: The invocation type for a Lambda data source.

nested_items.name: onSubscribe
nested_items.description: The configuration for the OnSubscribe handler.

nested_items.name: behavior
nested_items.description: The behavior for the handler.

nested_items.name: integration
nested_items.description: The integration data source configuration for the handler.

nested_items.name: dataSourceName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the data source that has been configured on the API.

nested_items.name: lambdaConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for a Lambda data source.

nested_items.name: invokeType
nested_items.description: The invocation type for a Lambda data source.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier that was returned from the previous call to this operation, which you can use to return the next set of items in the list.
